chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Guys, we have seen almost everything in HTML.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: In today's video, we will conclude HTML

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: and talk about some miscellaneous things

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: which will help you a lot in your web development journey.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: After that, we will start CSS from the coming videos.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I am very excited to conclude HTML.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: You guys like this video and write Sigma patch op in the comment section below.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So guys, as you can see, I have come to my computer screen.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And without wasting time, I will create a new folder here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I will name it video 13.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I will come in this, right click and open the VS code.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And I will make a file index.html.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Now here I have given the file index.html.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Now I want to tell you one thing.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: There are many things in HTML that you have to explore yourself.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I will tell you some things here and after this video, I will conclude HTML.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you want in HTML,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I will turn on Word Wrap and toggle Screencast Mode.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Suppose you want to write this in HTML,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: 3 is greater than 4.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Suppose you want to write this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you try to write this in HTML,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I will show you the preview of this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So it came here by writing 3 is greater than 4.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Now suppose I write here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: this is the code for paragraph.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And I write something like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Now I have written this here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I want it to appear.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: But you see here, it will not appear.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Why not?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Because how will it know that I want to write the code for paragraph

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: or I want to use this P tag as a syntax.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So HTML entities are to be avoided from this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Now let me tell you what HTML entities are.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you write ampersand lt semicolon here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: lt for less than,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then you can write it as lt semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Now if you write ampersand lt semicolon here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: and replace it with ampersand lt semicolon,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: and you replace the greater than with ampersand gt semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I will show you this thing.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you replace it with ampersand gt semicolon,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then what will happen?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: That it will appear here as it is written.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: As you can see, I will zoom in and show you.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So what happens is that HTML entities are used

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: to write those things that may collide with the syntax of HTML.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: What does it mean to collide?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If we write the code of paragraph tag here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then how will HTML know that this is the code of paragraph tag?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Or if you want to write this thing as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: There is also a pre tag for this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you put anything in the pre tag

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: and you write here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then P, this is a para.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So if you write it like this,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then it will come here as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: It will come as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And along with that, if you write new lines here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: this is after few new lines.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And some more.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you write like this,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then it will come as it is.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Keeping all the spaces intact,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: keeping all the new lines intact.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: But it is not that tags will show up here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: For tags, we will have to use entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So this happens in pre tag HTML.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So we have seen entities, we have seen pre tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you want to put a copyright symbol,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then you can write ampersand copy semicolon.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And as you write ampersand copy semicolon here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then you will get to see the copyright symbol here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: As you can see.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So you can do such things with the help of HTML entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So you try out all these examples.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Non-breaking spaces.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Along with that, you can use special symbols.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Like we saw copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Ampersand nbsp is used for space.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And it is very important.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So if I write here copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay. I write here copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And suppose I want for some reason,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: after seeing a lot of spaces here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And I write here code with Harry.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So if I write copyright code with Harry,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then this space will be considered as a fake space.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Because in HTML, the extra spaces are ignored.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So if you see here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then the code with Harry came immediately after the copyright.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: But ideally we don't want that.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: What do we want?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: We want that the spaces that I have put,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: they come.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So don't put spaces.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: You put ampersand nbsp.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: The more you put ampersand nbsp,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: the more spaces will come.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: You see here, these spaces are coming.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So whenever you want to put space in your HTML code,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: ampersand nbsp is something you should go after.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: how to put these breaking spaces,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: and along with that,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: the reserved characters in HTML,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: like less than, greater than,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: you can do all this with HTML entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: After this, what is quotation tag?

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Quotation tag helps you write quotation in this way.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I will tell you the example of quotation tag here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So the quotation tag works like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And as soon as you write,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: this quotation text here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So what will happen is that the search engines will know

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: that you are actually writing a quotation.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And you can also style it with CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Then here, if you want to cite anything,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: you can put its URL.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Similarly, you can also use Q tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Site is equal to, put the URL here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So if you want to cite any research article,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: or there can be other reasons.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you want to cite Wikipedia,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then this tag is used.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And you can style it obviously with the help of CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So these are our quotation tags.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And HTML entities.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Then there are some HTML tags that have become obsolete.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Like font tag has become obsolete

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: because we handle font with the help of CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: We don't use font tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: There were many attributes in font,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: like color, size,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: and you can use font tag like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: But it's not recommended that you use font tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Then center tag,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: it was helpful in centering things.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: But now I will recommend you that

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: we will center with CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Flexbox, Grid, etc.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: We will learn modern CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So all these tags are those

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: about which you should know.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: But you should also know that

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: you don't have to use them.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I hope that helps.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Then code tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Tag is the most important for coders.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Like you are seeing this website here,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: codewithari.com.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: You are seeing that I have used the code tag here.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And if you are very excited about this thing,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then I will tell you that

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I am using a library called Prism CSS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Many people ask me.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: And I will tell you how to do all these things.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Prism JS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Prism JS.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: Prism.js.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: What happens with this is that

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: your code is highlighted like this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: You can put code in your blog, etc.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So I am using this library.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I will tell you how to do everything.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: I am also using React in this.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: We are going to read all those things later.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: So don't worry at all.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: But if you want to write code in this way,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then you have to use the code tag.

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: If you go to its source code by right-clicking,

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: then you will see that

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: any code is written in the pre

chunks.title: Entities, Code tag and more on HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #13
chunks.text: and in the code tag.

text: Guys, we have seen almost everything in HTML. In today's video, we will conclude HTML and talk about some miscellaneous things which will help you a lot in your web development journey. After that, we will start CSS from the coming videos. I am very excited to conclude HTML. You guys like this video and write Sigma patch op in the comment section below. Let's go to the computer screen. Let's roll the intro. So guys, as you can see, I have come to my computer screen. And without wasting time, I will create a new folder here. I will name it video 13. I will come in this, right click and open the VS code. And I will make a file index.html. Okay. Now here I have given the file index.html. Now I want to tell you one thing. There are many things in HTML that you have to explore yourself. I will tell you some things here and after this video, I will conclude HTML. If you want in HTML, I will turn on Word Wrap and toggle Screencast Mode. Suppose you want to write this in HTML, 3 is greater than 4. Suppose you want to write this. If you try to write this in HTML, I will show you the preview of this. So it came here by writing 3 is greater than 4. Now suppose I write here, this is the code for paragraph. Okay. And I write something like this. Now I have written this here. I want it to appear. But you see here, it will not appear. Why not? Because how will it know that I want to write the code for paragraph or I want to use this P tag as a syntax. So HTML entities are to be avoided from this. Now let me tell you what HTML entities are. If you write ampersand lt semicolon here, lt for less than, then you can write it as lt semicolon. Now if you write ampersand lt semicolon here, and replace it with ampersand lt semicolon, and you replace the greater than with ampersand gt semicolon. I will show you this thing. If you replace it with ampersand gt semicolon, then what will happen? That it will appear here as it is written. As you can see, I will zoom in and show you. Okay. So what happens is that HTML entities are used to write those things that may collide with the syntax of HTML. What does it mean to collide? If we write the code of paragraph tag here, then how will HTML know that this is the code of paragraph tag? Or if you want to write this thing as it is. There is also a pre tag for this. If you put anything in the pre tag and you write here, then P, this is a para. So if you write it like this, then it will come here as it is. As you can see. It will come as it is. And along with that, if you write new lines here, this is after few new lines. Okay. And some more. If you write like this, then it will come as it is. Keeping all the spaces intact, keeping all the new lines intact. But it is not that tags will show up here. For tags, we will have to use entities. So this happens in pre tag HTML. So we have seen entities, we have seen pre tag. If you want to put a copyright symbol, then you can write ampersand copy semicolon. And as you write ampersand copy semicolon here, then you will get to see the copyright symbol here. As you can see. Okay. So you can do such things with the help of HTML entities. So you try out all these examples. Non-breaking spaces. Along with that, you can use special symbols. Like we saw copyright. Ampersand nbsp is used for space. And it is very important. So if I write here copyright. Okay. I write here copyright. And suppose I want for some reason, after seeing a lot of spaces here. And I write here code with Harry. Okay. So if I write copyright code with Harry, then this space will be considered as a fake space. Because in HTML, the extra spaces are ignored. So if you see here, then the code with Harry came immediately after the copyright. But ideally we don't want that. What do we want? We want that the spaces that I have put, they come. So don't put spaces. You put ampersand nbsp. The more you put ampersand nbsp, the more spaces will come. You see here, these spaces are coming. So whenever you want to put space in your HTML code, ampersand nbsp is something you should go after. Okay. So here, how to put these breaking spaces, and along with that, the reserved characters in HTML, like less than, greater than, you can do all this with HTML entities. After this, what is quotation tag? Quotation tag helps you write quotation in this way. I will tell you the example of quotation tag here. So the quotation tag works like this. And as soon as you write, this quotation text here. So what will happen is that the search engines will know that you are actually writing a quotation. Okay. And you can also style it with CSS. Then here, if you want to cite anything, you can put its URL. Similarly, you can also use Q tag. Site is equal to, put the URL here. So if you want to cite any research article, or there can be other reasons. If you want to cite Wikipedia, then this tag is used. Okay. And you can style it obviously with the help of CSS. So these are our quotation tags. Okay. And HTML entities. Then there are some HTML tags that have become obsolete. Like font tag has become obsolete because we handle font with the help of CSS. We don't use font tag. There were many attributes in font, like color, size, and you can use font tag like this. But it's not recommended that you use font tag. Then center tag, it was helpful in centering things. But now I will recommend you that we will center with CSS. Flexbox, Grid, etc. We will learn modern CSS. So all these tags are those about which you should know. But you should also know that you don't have to use them. Okay. I hope that helps. Then code tag. Tag is the most important for coders.
